com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc

Interface JDBCResolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurableResolver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurableJDBCResolver

    public interface JDBCResolver
extends ConfigurableResolver
    JDBCResolver is the interface used by the JDBCEngine to create PreparedStatements for XACML attribute requests and convert the ResultSet into XACML attributes.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Attribute> decodeResult(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
      Creates a List of Attributes from the given ResultSet returned by a SQL SELECT statement.

      Creates a PreparedStatement for a SQL SELECT statement that will retrieve the data used to generate the XACML AttributeValues.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.ConfigurableResolver

        attributesProvided, attributesRequired, configure

    • Method Detail

      • getPreparedStatement

        java.sql.PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement(PIPEngine pipEngine,
                                              PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                              PIPFinder pipFinder,
                                              java.sql.Connection connection)
                                                throws PIPException
        Creates a PreparedStatement for a SQL SELECT statement that will retrieve the data used to generate the XACML AttributeValues.
        Parameters:
        pipEngine - the PIPEngine making the request for XACML AttributeValues
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest with the requested XACML Attributes
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder for finding any other XACML AttributeValues required to build the query.
        connection - the Connection needed to create the PreparedStatement
        Returns:
        a PreparedStatement to query the database for the required XACML AttributeValues.
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error creating the PreparedStatement

      • decodeResult

        java.util.List<Attribute> decodeResult(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
                                       throws PIPException
        Creates a List of Attributes from the given ResultSet returned by a SQL SELECT statement. The ResultSet should already be positioned at the first element to decode. The implementation may choose to decode multiple results before returning or may only decode the current result. The implementation should leave the cursor on the last result decoded.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - the ResultSet returned from a SQL SELECT statement.
        Returns:
        a new List of Attributes generated by parsing the given ResultSet or an empty List if there are no results.
        Throws:
        PIPException
